attributes.action: remove Sir Peter Viggers' Knighthood following his expenses scandal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To remove Sir Peter Viggers' Knighthood following his recent expenses scandal. He has been clearly expoliting the system for personal gain and nothing to do with taxpayers interests at heart. The man is a disgrace, and should surely be removed of the honorary title immediately.

rejection.details: Petitions to the Number 10 site should request an action that can be taken by the Government. Only the Queen can remove a knighthood.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
